Interface IUser

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    User

    public interface IUser

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<FeedMessage> search(java.lang.String keyWord, IDataBase db)
      With this method, user can search news with a keyWord, return list of related news.
      java.lang.String viewArticle(FeedMessage msg)
      With this method, user can view the details of an article he or she is interested in.

    • Method Detail

      • search

        java.util.List<FeedMessage> search(java.lang.String keyWord,
                                   IDataBase db)
        With this method, user can search news with a keyWord, return list of related news.
        Parameters:
        keyWord - the topic user is interested in
        db - the database storing all news available
        Returns:
        a list of overview of news

      • viewArticle

        java.lang.String viewArticle(FeedMessage msg)
        With this method, user can view the details of an article he or she is interested in.
        Parameters:
        msg - the overview of a news obtained from search
        Returns:
        the full content
